Graphics::PointLight

Graphics::PointLight Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for Graphics::PointLight:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

For internal use only.

Point Light. It is a light source that emits in all directions equally. Therefore, the orientation/direction are ignored in this kind of light

bool Graphics::PointLight::init ( float  r,
float  g,
float  b,
float  x,
float  y,
float  z 
)

Initializes the class so it becomes valid.

For internal use only.

Parameters:
[in] r Red component of the diffuse color of the light. Value Range: 0..1
[in] g Green component of the diffuse color of the light. Value Range: 0..1
[in] b Blue component of the diffuse color of the light. Value Range: 0..1
[in] x x coordinate (horizontal axis) of the light in the scene
[in] y y coordinate (vertical axis) of the light in the scene
[in] z z coordinate (depth) of the light in the scene
Returns:
true if the initialization was ok | false otherwise
